p.k: Charlie meets a creature just like him named Ralph. / The Bears have a relaxing day at the spa. Grizz tries to get everything the spa has to offer. Panda gets trapped in the steam room with an old man. And Ice Bear plays ping pong. / The Bears think they have what it takes to make and star in a viral video, but when Nom-Nom decides that they don’t, Grizz breaks into the koala’s limo in order to change his mind.
